quotes.quote: See that any time you feel pained or defeated, it is only because you insist on clinging to what doesn't work. Dare to let go and you won't lose a thing except for a punishing idea.
A defeated argument that refuses to be obliterated can remain very alive.
Defeat teach us us life's most valuable lessons.
Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
Defeat isn't bitter if you don't swallow it.
Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
Defeat should never be a source of discouragement but rather a fresh stimulus.
Do not let defeat be a failure, let defeat be a means of moving on to better things with new knowledge if you take that type of attitude you will find success even in defeat!
To be defeated and yet not surrender, this is victory.
My past has not defined me, destroyed me, deterred me, or defeated me; it has only strengthened me.
We are never defeated unless we give up on God.
Failure, loss and defeat are just mile markers on the road to success.
Right defeated is stronger than evil triumphant.
Defeat is a school in which truth always grows strong.
Believe you are defeated, believe it long enough, and it is likely to become a fact.
Prefer to be defeated in the presence of the wise than to excel among fools.
A man may be defeated by his own secondary successes.
You are a failure not the time when you are defeated.. but when you give up fighting
It is better to be defeated standing for a high principle than to run by committing subterfuge.
Defeat is a state of mind. You are defeated only when you accept defeat, and assume the hopeless mindset of a defeated person.
Defeat begins with the fear that one has lost.
When defeat comes, accept it as a signal that your plans are not sound, rebuild those plans, and set sail once more toward your coveted goal.
You're not defeated when you lose a battle. You are defeated when you give up the struggle.
You are not defeated when you lose. You are defeated when you quit.
Defeat is only a word defeat was the beginning of a victory.
No man is defeated without until he has first been defeated within.
Anyone can deal with victory. Only the mighty can bear defeat.
Falling down isnt defeat is when you refuse to get up.
One is defeated only when one accepts defeat.
Every defeat every heartbreak every loss contains its own seed, Its own lesson on how to improve your performance the next time.
Defeat is a state of mind; no one is ever defeated until defeat has been accepted as a reality.
Defeat never comes to any man until he admits it.
You can be defeated by life's unavoidable disappointments, or you can become stronger because of them.
Failure is a temporary defeat, while success is everlasting victory.
Defeat doesn't finish a man, quit does. A man is not finished when he's defeated. He's finished when he quits.
